com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.project
Class ProjectManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.explorer.project.ProjectManager

public final class ProjectManager
extends Object

This class manages projects.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

public List<Project> getProjects(String prefix)

Parameters:

Returns:

getProject

public Project getProject(ProjectNode node)
Returns the project that belongs to a project node.

Parameters:
node - the project node for which we want to retrieve the project
Returns:
the project of the node

getProject

public Project getProject(String name)
Returns the project for the given project name.

Note that in case of multiple projects with the same name, only the first matching project will be returned.

Parameters:
name - project name
Returns:
the corresponding project or null

getProject

public Project getProject(long projectId)
Returns the project for the given project ID.

Parameters:
projectId - project ID
Returns:
the corresponding project or null

Adds a new project to this project manager.

Parameters:

Returns:
new project

removeProject

Parameters:

removeProjectManagerEventListener

public void removeProjectManagerEventListener(ProjectManagerEventListener listener)
Removes a ProjectManagerEventListener from the listener list.

Parameters:
listener - the ProjectManagerEventListener to be removed
